strapiPost.title: CACHE Considers Opening Venues... Slowly
strapiPost.content:
Some of our old, everyday activities just seem like a distant memory at this point, but slowly, those activities are becoming a reality once again. Local creative community hub, CACHE, recently united with a nationwide initiative aimed at reopening music venues safely across the US.

  • Why does this matter? NWA recently took up arms with Music Policy Forum's Reopen Every Venue Safely (REVS) initiative to work with live music enthusiasts (aka all of us) to safely open up venues again.
  • Domino effect: This comes shortly after CACHE hosted a panel consisting of regional experts and leaders to discuss reopening and allowing gathering in certain venues.

What to know more? Read the full story HERE.
